head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BASRI, DR. ALBERT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BASRI, DR. ALBERT

block.p: BASRI-Dr. Albert. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of Dr. Albert Basri beloved father of our devoted member Carole Basri, and grandfather of our Day School Alumni Joshua and Zachary. Deepest sympathy to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Michael Scharf, President Jerry Forst, Vice President Jack Rosen, Vice President
